details.title: BANDS x AIML Collab Projects Night â€“ Part 1
details.longDescription: Join a special collaboration between BANDS and the QUT AI & ML Society for How to Build Your ML Portfolio 101 â€“ Part 1 of a two-part series. Explore ML tools including GitHub, Kaggle, and practical documentation, and learn how to showcase your skills through hands-on experience and student-led guidance. Learn to build a polished ML portfolio, use GitHub for projects, level up on Kaggle, and make your work shine with clear READMEs and Jupyter demos. No experience needed â€“ just bring your curiosity and energy and pair up with peers from both societies. ğŸ”— RSVP via the link in our bio to secure your spot! ğŸš€ğŸ’¡
